text: Apologies for the #powercut in #StokeOnTrent #ST2 & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 22:00. Geraint
All customers affected by the #powercut in #BS31 #Saltford #Bristol now have their supply restored. Our apologies for any inconvenience caused.  Siân
Update #powercut #Saltford #Bristol #BS31. We're sorry for the delay in restoring power, our engineers are working to have all properties back on by 01:00. Geraint
Apologies for the #powercut in #Saltford #Bristol #BS31 & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 23:00. Geraint
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to #Barnstaple #EX32 area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut. Geraint
There is currently a #powercut in #Barnstaple #EX32 & surrounding areas. We are working on the issue and we estimate to have the power restored by 21:00. Ellie
All customers affected by the #powercut in #BS6 #Redland now have their supply restored. Our apologies for any inconvenience caused.   Siân
#powercut #Redland #BS6 & surrounding areas. We're sorry for the delay in restoring power, our engineers are working to have all properties back on by 07:30.  Siân
There is currently a #powercut in #BS6 #Redland & surrounding areas. We are working on the issue and we estimate to have the power restored by 06:30. Siân.
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to the #Castlethorpe #MK19 area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut. Andi.
We are aware of a #powercut in the #Castlethorpe #MK19 and surrounding area. We aim to restore all supplies by 16:30. Andi.
All customers affected by the #powercut in #Newcastle #ST5 now have their supply restored. Our apologies for any inconvenience caused. Owen
Apologies to customers affected by the #powercut at #Newcastle #ST5 and the surrounding area. Engineers estimate 11:00 to restore the power.
We are aware that properties are without power in #Wenvoe #CF5 & surrounding area. We aim to restore all supplies by 06:00. Apologies to all affected by the #powercut

We're pleased to say that all power supplies to #SA15 #Llanelli area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut  Siân
Apologies for the #powercut in #Exmouth #EX8. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 12:00.  Siân
